name: part_011
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei and Shiranui Flare perform 'How-to World Domination'.
Hoshimachi Suisei and Shiranui Flare have an MC talk about their performance and Flare's birthday.
Shiranui Flare performs her solo song 'Zenkai Jumping!'.

subtitles.original: ハウツー世界征服
subtitles.english: How-to World Domination

subtitles.original: いければいいのにな
subtitles.english: If only I could go

subtitles.original: 最終列車の汽笛がうるさくなり響く
subtitles.english: The whistle of the last train echoes loudly

subtitles.original: どうせ愛なんてって吐きこぼして強がっても きっと本心じゃ疚しさに襲われて
subtitles.english: Even if I spit out "love is whatever" and act tough, I'm surely being attacked by guilt in my true feelings

subtitles.original: 期待現状の僕は そうかいどうしようもないな
subtitles.english: I, with current expectations, well, there's nothing I can do

subtitles.original: うるさいな お前なんて大嫌いだ
subtitles.english: Shut up, I hate you!

subtitles.original: あの空でミサイルが飛ぶのならば
subtitles.english: If missiles were to fly in that sky

subtitles.original: そんなもので命が飛ぶのならば
subtitles.english: If lives were to fly because of such things

subtitles.original: 優しい人にならなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I must become a kind person

subtitles.original: 僕も 僕も 肯定されたい
subtitles.english: I, too, want to be affirmed

subtitles.original: 優しい人にならなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I must become a kind person

subtitles.original: 心がかじかむ前に
subtitles.english: Before my heart freezes

subtitles.original: すいちゃん何だこれは！？
subtitles.english: Suichan, what was that!?

subtitles.original: 声は！？
subtitles.english: The voice!?

subtitles.original: スリル！
subtitles.english: Thrill!

subtitles.original: ショック！
subtitles.english: Shock!

subtitles.original: サスペンス！
subtitles.english: Suspense!

subtitles.original: 違うんですよ、この曲違うんですよ。
subtitles.english: Wait, this isn't right. This isn't that song.

subtitles.original: ハウツー世界征服です。
subtitles.english: It's How-to World Domination.

subtitles.original: そうなんですよ。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: でもリハでさ、
subtitles.english: But in rehearsal,

subtitles.original: リハですっごい一生懸命二人で、あのどんな感じにしようかって考えてた結果、
subtitles.english: we were both thinking really hard about how to do it, and as a result,

subtitles.original: もうどうしてもどうしても...
subtitles.english: no matter what, no matter what...

subtitles.original: もう何をどうしてもこうとしか鳴らなかったから、
subtitles.english: no matter what we did, it just sounded like that,

subtitles.original: じゃあもうこれでいこうって。
subtitles.english: so we were like, "Let's just go with this."

subtitles.original: これ入れなかったときボツだったもんね。
subtitles.english: It was gonna be scrapped if we didn't put that in.

subtitles.original: そう、もうこれにしたからね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, so we went with this.

subtitles.original: あ、これで誤魔化したんだ。
subtitles.english: Ah, so you faked it with this.

subtitles.original: あ、ふーたん。
subtitles.english: Ah, Fu-tan.

subtitles.original: 誕生日らしいね。
subtitles.english: I hear it's your birthday.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ！
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: っていうか、すいちゃん忙しいのに、ね、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: I mean, thanks for coming even though you're busy, Suichan.

subtitles.original: だって二人で歌うのってそうそうないからね、実を言うと。
subtitles.english: To be honest, we don't get many chances to sing as a duo.

subtitles.original: そう、てか初めて...
subtitles.english: Yeah, actually it's the first time...

subtitles.original: なんか一緒に、誰かと一緒に歌う、みたいな。
subtitles.english: like, singing together, just the two of us.

subtitles.original: 3人とか、しらけんとかはあったんだけど。
subtitles.english: We've had trios or Shiraken, but...

subtitles.original: ちょっとなんかすいちゃんと歌ってみたいなと思って。
subtitles.english: I really wanted to try singing with Suichan.

subtitles.original: 歌うんだったらでも、あのすいちゃんのカッコいい低音と、私が得意な高音と、
subtitles.english: But if we were going to sing, I wanted to hear Suichan's cool low notes mixed with my high notes,

subtitles.original: なんか合わさったやつ聞いてみたくて。
subtitles.english: I wanted to hear that combination.

subtitles.original: あんますいちゃんってさ、そういうの歌ってないなと思って。
subtitles.english: I felt like Suichan doesn't sing things like that very often.

subtitles.original: 高いの無理。
subtitles.english: High notes are a no-go for me.

subtitles.original: 「これもアリだ」って思ってもらえたら嬉しいなと思って私もちょっと頑張ろうと思って。
subtitles.english: I'd be happy if people thought "this is good too," so I decided to give it my all.

subtitles.original: ハウツー世界征服めっちゃ合ってたと思う。
subtitles.english: I think How-to World Domination suited us perfectly.

subtitles.original: 私もね、すいちゃんと歌えてめっちゃ嬉しかった。
subtitles.english: I was really happy to sing with Suichan too.

subtitles.original: あの「うるさいな お前なんて」がカッコいい！
subtitles.english: That "Shut up, I hate you" part was so cool!

subtitles.original: 「大嫌いだ！」
subtitles.english: I hate you!

subtitles.original: でも私は好きだぞって思ってた。
subtitles.english: But I was thinking, "I like you, though."

subtitles.original: いや、頑張りました、あの高音、本当に。
subtitles.english: Man, I really worked hard on those high notes.

subtitles.original: もうそーたんが、もうスコーンって高音出すからさ、
subtitles.english: Flare-tan's high notes are just so crisp,

subtitles.original: すいちゃんは頑張ってもう、もう下の方を支えました。
subtitles.english: so Suichan did her best to support the low end.

subtitles.original: いやでも、支えてもらった低音がカッコよすぎて、
subtitles.english: But the low notes you provided were way too cool,

subtitles.original: めっちゃ好きって思って。
subtitles.english: I really loved it.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was so much fun!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、また一緒に歌おう。
subtitles.english: Thank you, let's sing together again.

subtitles.original: ね、また一緒に歌いたい。
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'd love to sing together again.

subtitles.original: 全力ジャンピング！
subtitles.english: Zenkai Jumping!

subtitles.original: Yeah, ah!!
subtitles.english: Yeah, ah!!

subtitles.original: 全力ジャンピング！
subtitles.english: Zenkai Jumping!

subtitles.original: どこへ行こうか 計画なしで
subtitles.english: Where shall we go? Without a plan

subtitles.original: 歌いながら気の向く方へ
subtitles.english: Singing along, wherever we feel like

subtitles.original: 迷ってるの？ 冒険してるの？
subtitles.english: Are you lost? Are you adventuring?

subtitles.original: それは自分次第！
subtitles.english: That's all up to you!

subtitles.original: まだまだ楽しみ足んないっ
subtitles.english: Not having enough fun yet!

subtitles.original: 足んない！
subtitles.english: Not enough!

subtitles.original: 足んない！
subtitles.english: Not enough!

subtitles.original: ワクワクすぐ明日へ
subtitles.english: Excited for tomorrow already

subtitles.original: 思い切って 張り切って
subtitles.english: Boldly, with all our might

subtitles.original: 前向いて さあ進もう
subtitles.english: Facing forward, let's go!

subtitles.original: せーのっ！
subtitles.english: Ready, go!

subtitles.original: せーのっ！
subtitles.english: One, two, go!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: どんときて 遊び尽くしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Bring it on, let's play our hearts out

subtitles.original: イッツ・オーライ！
subtitles.english: It's Alright!

subtitles.original: やりすぎちゃうくらいで イッツ・オーライ
subtitles.english: It's okay to overdo it—it's alright!

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: 早起きも 徹夜しちゃお
subtitles.english: Waking up early, staying up late

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: なんとかなっちゃうはずだから
subtitles.english: Because it'll all work out somehow

subtitles.original: イッツ・オール・オッケー！
subtitles.english: It's All Okay!

subtitles.original: ピンチはチャンスになるからさ
subtitles.english: A pinch will turn into a chance, you know

subtitles.original: イッツ・オール・オッケー！
subtitles.english: It's All Okay!

subtitles.original: みんなで笑えば無敵だね
subtitles.english: We're invincible when we laugh together

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: なんたって全力で 突き抜けちゃって
subtitles.english: Give it your all and break through

subtitles.original: ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: まっすぐな気持ちで行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go with straightforward feelings

subtitles.original: ホップステップジャンピング！ 飛び出そう
subtitles.english: Hop, step, jumping! Let's leap out

subtitles.original: Yeah, ah!!
subtitles.english: Yeah, ah!!

subtitles.original: 順調に行く時だけじゃ
subtitles.english: If things only go smoothly

subtitles.original: それはそれで退屈だね
subtitles.english: then that's just boring, isn't it

subtitles.original: わがままかもしれないけど
subtitles.english: It might be selfish of me, but

subtitles.original: 失敗は成功の元！
subtitles.english: Failure is the seed of success!

subtitles.original: とか格好つけてみたけど
subtitles.english: I tried to act all cool like that, but

subtitles.original: やらかしちゃった日の夜は
subtitles.english: on the nights I've really messed up

subtitles.original: 枕に向かって叫んだ
subtitles.english: I screamed into my pillow
